snippet: The authorities are investigating whether a teenager who killed four people in a 2013 drunken-driving wreck, and claimed as part of his defense that he suffered from “affluenza,” has fled with his mother to avoid a potential violation of his...
abstract: Authorities are investigating whether Ethan Couch, teenager who killed four people in 2013 drunken driving accident in Texas, has fled probation with his mother.
lead_paragraph: The authorities are investigating whether a teenager who killed four people in a 2013 drunken-driving wreck, and claimed as part of his defense that he suffered from “affluenza,” has fled with his mother to avoid a potential violation of his probation.
